title: Configuration Parameter Oracle
description: Find valid configuration entries with proper key-value syntax. These settings must follow specific formatting rules for system configuration files.
solutionSummary: Uses non-capturing groups (?:...) with quantifiers, word boundaries, and character classes: [a-z]+ for the first key part, (?:\.[a-z_]+)* for optional dot-separated sections with underscores allowed, = for the separator, and [a-zA-Z0-9_:]+ for values that can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and colons.
